description: Traditionally served with turkey at Thanksgiving, the smooth, sweet potato contrasts well with the crunchy, salty topping.
name: Sweet Potato Casserole With Bacon Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180C. Cook the potatoes in a saucepan of boiling water for 10­-15 minutes, or until tender. Drain well, mash until smooth, and set aside.

In a frying pan, dry-fry the bacon over a medium-high heat for 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally, until evenly browned and crisp. Remove from the pan and drain on paper towels. Sprinkle with the cinnamon and caster sugar. Set aside. When it is cool enough to handle, crumble the bacon.

Place the eggs, sugar, and melted butter in a large bowl and, using a balloon whisk or an electric hand whisk, whisk until well combined; the mixture should be golden and silky. Add the milk and vanilla extract, then mix in the potatoes until well blended. Spoon the mixture into a large ovenproof casserole with a capacity of about 4 L.

Melt the butter and combine with the brown sugar, crumbled bacon pieces, and pecans. Sprinkle over the potato mixture in the casserole. Bake in the oven for 45 minutes. If the topping starts to brown, cover the dish with foil. Serve hot.
